1.Pros: They have raised pay for management
1.Cons: You have to put up with a lot of stuff that worth the increase of pay

2.Pros: McDonald's is great to work for if you are just starting out. A lot of exit opportunities while getting a solid foundation for business.
2.Cons: The pay is a little lower than other places. The work-life balance is sometimes a little sketchy. Sometimes hard work is not rewarded.

3.Pros: I learned how to make my own money

4.Pros: When I was employed, it was a great company to work for. Flexible, great work life balance. However this will depend on your direct manager. Mine was great.
4.Cons: Hard to move up as there are many layers and should have good network. They are currently going through a big re-org.

5.Summary: "Good job, but at a high cost"
5.Pros: Generally a very well organized company with extensive training for managers, scheduling accommodations for everyone, bonuses and benefits (vary by owner/corporate)
5.Cons: Stressful management jobs, swing shifts can turn you into a zombie...

6.Pros: Meet different people which is fun!
